title: PhD Program
content: I started my PhD at the College of Computing and Data Science (CCDS), Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, under the supervision of Asst. Prof. Yoonchang Sung.

title: Master's Thesis Defense
content: I successfully defended my master's thesis titled "A Deep Reinforcement Learning Framework with Edge-Aware Encoding for the Traveling Salesman Problem with Drone."

title: Paper Accepted by Neural Computing and Applications
content: New Paper “Navigation variable-based multi-objective particle swarm optimization for UAV path planning with kinematic constraints” on Neural Computing and Applications.

title: Paper Accepted by RiTA 2024
content: I present my paper “Cooperative Mission Planning for Heterogeneous Robots with Energy Constraints” as a poster at The 12th International Conference on Robot Intelligence Technology and Applications (RiTA 2024).
